title: WHAT IS THIS WEBSITE FOR?
detail: This website is for creating a database of all the plans for the incoming swimming plan of Grade 10 that will surely happen. Currently on planning stage.

title: HOW MUCH IS THE BUDGET?
detail: I'm expecting atleast less than Php 500 (per person) but I can be wrong provided that we're going out of town. Although it's not bad to dream.

title: WHO AND HOW MANY ARE GOING?
detail: At best the my whole batch but that's never going to happen, so around half of the batch would suffice including some of the people at the lower batch of ours. More or less 15 people

title: WHEN WILL THIS BE HAPPENING?
detail: At best fourth week of June 2022. It cannot be earlier but can definitely be later. There is no exact date yet.
